Content Questions: In Fifty-Four Things Wrong with Gwendolyn Rogers, by Caela Carter, name two things from the list "Things that are awesome about Gwendolyn Rogers" that Mom wrote.
Answer: Compassionate with all animals, especially horses. Compassionate with her friends. Incredibly accepting of everyone who's different. Creative. The best person to talk with (for Mom)

Content Questions: In Fifty-Four Things Wrong with Gwendolyn Rogers, by Caela Carter, name the two things from the list "Awesome things about Tyler Rogers".
Answer: Does the best, tightest braids. Treats boys and girls the same. Fun to play with. I never knew I needed a brother until I met him. Great at basketball
